objects.text:
• Motivational Typography Design
• Premium Cotton Material
• Comfortable Round Neck
• Modern Script & Block Letters

product_details.name: Believe in Yourself - Inspirational Navy Blue Premium T-Shirt
product_details.description:
• Motivational 'Believe in Yourself' Typography Design
• Premium Quality Navy Blue Cotton Material
• Stylish Tone-on-Tone Text Effect
• Comfortable Round Neck Design
• Short Sleeve Casual Fit
• Perfect for Daily Wear and Self-Expression
• Modern Script and Block Letter Combination
• Durable High-Quality Print
• Easy to Match with Various Outfits
• Available in Multiple Sizes
• Machine Washable
• Breathable Fabric for All-Day Comfort

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and motivational design centered around a navy premium t-shirt. A bold headline (`heading`) draws attention, followed by a scripted tagline (`tagline`) that adds personal encouragement. The `subheading` highlights the product type, and a clean underline (`decorative_line`) separates it from the feature list (`description`), which details quality, typography, and comfort features. A vibrant promotional message (`offer`) in large yellow type provides urgency, reinforced by the price (`price`) and a high-visibility call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). A realistic mockup (`product_image`) showcases the product prominently. 

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#0f172a`
- Royal Blue: `#1e3a8a`
- Sky Blue: `#60a5fa`
- Canary Yellow: `#fbbf24`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a minimalist and motivating design on a deep navy blue t-shirt (#0F1A3D). The primary graphic includes repeated bold text “BELIEVE” in a muted slate blue shade (#3B4A5E), providing a subtle but structured background. Layered over it is a handwritten-style white script saying “On yourself” (#E6E6E6), creating a strong focal point while blending elegantly with the background text. The color blend plays with tone-on-tone elements to maintain coherence, yet the white script gives a vibrant contrast that draws attention. For an advertisement banner, use a palette of navy (#0F1A3D), slate blue (#3B4A5E), soft gray (#C8CBD0), and white (#E6E6E6).
